author: Bryan Hargrave
comment: I have a calibrated mic and smaart. This app is upwards of 30db off almost always.
title: Useless

author: Jeremy Jessome
comment: Thanks for your reply! You can calibrate it with the plus and minus! Perfect.

reply.author: Abdulla Eqab
reply.content: The app has a manual calibration option, you can press the plus or minus buttons, and it will remember your settings
